name: create-precast-app
description: CLI tool to scaffold modern web applications with your chosen stack

scripts.build: tsup src/cli.ts src/index.ts --format esm --clean && cp -r src/templates dist/ && bun run audit:fix
scripts.audit:fix: command -v npm >/dev/null 2>&1 && (npm audit --audit-level=moderate || npm audit fix) || echo 'npm not available, skipping audit'
scripts.update:templates: bun run src/scripts/update-template-deps.ts && bun run build
scripts.build:test: bun run build && tsup test-runner.ts --format esm --clean --out-dir dist-test
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo 'Build should be done before publishing'
scripts.prepack: echo 'Build should be done before packing'
scripts.publish:beta: bun run build && npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:patch: bun run build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: bun run build && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: bun run build && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.publish:dry: echo 'Use: npm publish --dry-run (after ensuring node is in PATH)'
scripts.pack:test: echo 'Files that will be published:' && ls -la dist/ && echo 'Plus: README.md, CHANGELOG.md, LICENSE, package.json'
scripts.publish:check: bun run build && echo 'Ready for publishing!'
scripts.test:core: bun run build:test && node dist-test/test-runner.js --suites core
scripts.test:generation: bun run build:test && node dist-test/test-runner.js --suites generation
scripts.test:report: bun run build:test && node dist-test/test-runner.js --report-path ./reports/test-report.html --report-format html
